casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. EVANS
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. COMMON PLEAS COURT JUDGES 2018-1732 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus and Procedendo. On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's motion for sanctions and motion for special prosecutor denied as moot.
